Title: Hope Springs Paternal
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Sheila Callaghan, Lisa Morales (staff writer)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona starts to go nuts while under house arrest. Ian shows up at home. Carl almost gets expelled from school, but gets helped out by Frank. Debbie starts to become a woman and connects with the "other sister"
